scripts.server: npx cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH='./plugins' TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki . --listen port=8080
scripts.build: npx cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH='./plugins' TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki . --output docs --build index
scripts.build-library: npx cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH='./plugins' TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki . --output docs/library --build library
